thread.title: New ISO Project Initiation Documentation Toolkit gets ISO management system projects off to the best start
thread.title_full: New ISO Project Initiation Documentation Toolkit gets ISO management system projects off to the best start

title: New ISO Project Initiation Documentation Toolkit gets ISO management system projects off to the best start
text:
October 26, 2015 at 08:30 AM EDT New ISO Project Initiation Documentation Toolkit gets ISO management system projects off to the best start 
IT Governance has added a new product to its web store: the ISO Project Initiation Documentation (PID) Toolkit. ELY, ENGLAND, October 26, 2015 / EINPresswire.com / -- IT Governance, the leading global provider of information security products and services, has added a new product to its web store: the ISO Project Initiation Documentation (PID) Toolkit . The ideal starting point for any ISO management system standard implementation, the ISO Project Initiation Documentation Toolkit enables project owners to identify the necessary steps in any ISO management system implementation. The toolkit is designed to help establish a strong foundation for ISO projects before seeking board-level commitment. Available for immediate download, the ISO Project Initiation Documentation Toolkit contains procedures and tools that will accelerate the management buy-in process: â€¢ Project initiation document (PID)
